participant_2.background:
I am afraid of water.
I work in a factory.
My favorite color is purple.
My favorite team is the ohio state buckeyes.
I love to garden.

content.text: I love to go hiking and camping! Where is your favorite place to go hiking?
I'm afraid of water, so I don't really go hiking. Do you know any good places to go camping that aren't near water?
I know a few places! I'm in Ohio, so I usually go to Hocking Hills State Park. It's a beautiful place with lots of hiking trails.
Oh, I've heard of that place! It looks really nice. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to garden! I have a big garden in my backyard and I love to grow all kinds of vegetables.
That's awesome! I love gardening too! I don't have a lot of space, but I have a few pots on my patio where I grow some herbs and flowers.
That's great! I love growing herbs. They're so easy to take care of and they're so useful.
I know, right? I love having fresh herbs on hand for cooking.
Me too! I always have fresh basil and mint in my kitchen.
That's awesome! I love fresh basil and mint too.
So, what do you do for work?
I work as a software engineer.
Oh, cool! What kind of software do you develop?
I work on a team that develops software for healthcare providers.
Oh, that's interesting! I don't know much about healthcare software.
It's a pretty complex field, but it's also really interesting.
I'm sure it is. I'm just glad I don't have to deal with it!
Ha, me too! It can be a lot of work.
So, what do you like to do for fun outside of work?
I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Oh, me too! I love hiking and fishing. I don't really play video games, but I love watching movies.
We should go hiking together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to go hiking with you.
